com.samsung.samm.common

Class SAMMLibConstants

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.samsung.samm.common.SAMMLibConstants

  • public class SAMMLibConstants
extends java.lang.Object
    The constant definition class used in the SAMM(Samsung Animated Multimedia Messaging) Library.
    Since:
    S-Pen SDK 2.0, SAMM Library 1.0

      • SAMM_CUSTOM_BG_IMAGE_INDEX

        public static final int SAMM_CUSTOM_BG_IMAGE_INDEX
        The start value of the custom background image index.
        The SAMM library-compliant image index is less than this value.
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.0, SAMM Library 1.0
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SAMM_CUSTOM_BG_AUDIO_INDEX

        public static final int SAMM_CUSTOM_BG_AUDIO_INDEX
        The start value of the custom background audio index.
